name: Andrea Putting
offering: Amazon Best Seller Campaigns, Book Cover Design, Book Editing and Layout, Book Publishing, Compilation Books, Presentation Skills, Public Speaking, Publishing Services, Speaking Opportunities
what_you_do: Andrea Putting is a speaker, author, podcast host, and compassion curator who helps audiences lead with love through keynotes, facilitated sessions, and leadership advisory.
who_you_serve: Andrea works with individuals, communities, and visionary teams to reimagine leadership through compassion, connection, and collaboration.
social_proof: Andrea is a bestselling author, Toastmaster of the Year (2016), and recipient of multiple global honors from Speakers Tribe and the Innov8 Wordsmith Award (2021).
signature_programs: Andrea's signature programs include the Social Mission Revolution podcast, Chocolate & Coffee Day for Religious Harmony, and 5 bestselling books: Awakened Stealth Leadership, Compassionate Purpose, Compassionate Prosperity, Brewing Compassion, and Moment of Infinity.
business_focus: Andrea helps audiences trade volume for value through keynotes, storytelling, and intimate Chocolate & Coffee Breaks, cultivating Authentic Influence grounded in values and expressed through action.
service_provided: keynotes, Chocolate & Coffee Break facilitation, leadership labs and advisory, publishing support
